code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var issueBill=function issueBill(ib,success,failure){var issueBillPromise=axios.post("".concat(appConstants.API,"/paymentHistories"),ib).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.ISSUE_BILL,payload:issueBillPromise};};export var issueMonthly=function issueMonthly(obj,success,failure){var issueMonthlyPromise=axios.post("".concat(appConstants.API,"/paymentHistories/s"),obj).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.ISSUE_MONTHLY,payload:issueMonthlyPromise};};
